name: Wire2Air
tag_list: mobile-marketing, mobile-store-front, wap-store, mobile-content-service-platform, mobile-messaging, 2dqr-codes, sms-keywords, mobile-web, bulk-sms, text-marketing, text-message-marketing, text-messaging-services, text-messaging, texting-services, bulk-tex
overview: Wire2Air is a New York based SMS Aggregator and mobile marketing solution provider. It has been providing sms gateway connectivity, mobile marketing platform, mobile messaging, & mobile web solutions since 2002. Wire2Air is focused on providing dedicated short code hosting,SMS gateway, Managed mobile marketing platform and Mobile web tools for creating Text alerts, Text Voting, Text2Win, Group Texting, Text Trivia, Text for info, Mobile 2D/QRcode, Mobile websites, office SMS communication tools and complete with enhanced reporting and analytics to measurable campaigns effectiveness. The company helps businesses, and oragization easily manage their Text messaging and Mobile web based marketing campaigns. Wire2Air offers a hybrid self managed mobile marketing platform to execute a measurable mobile marketing campaigns. Wire2Air offers mobile marketing solutions using shared short code and dedicated short code. Wire2Air has successfully launched many mobile campaigns for retails giants, financial, logistic companies, etc combining text messaging with mobile web to create engaging mobile campaigns.
